thread.title: Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 5
thread.title_full: Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 5 - SFGate

author: sfgate.com
title: Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 5
text:
Don Henley : Best known as front man of the Eagles, the singer-songwriter returns to his country roots on his latest release, “Cass County.” 8 p.m. Monday, Oct. 5. The Masonic. www.livenation.com 
“Truck Stop”: Crowded Fire Theater performs the U.S. premiere of Australian writer Lachlan Philpott ’s gritty dramatization of the true story of high school girls working as prostitutes in highway rest areas. 8 p.m. Through Oct. 24. Thick House, 1695 18th St., S.F. (415) 523-0034. www.crowdedfire.org.
